titleStmt.title: Anno regni Gulielmi & Mariae regis & reginae, Angliae, Scotiae, Franciae & Hiberniae quinto. An act for granting to King William and Queen Mary the rate of one penny per pound upon the clear value of all the real and personal estates and six shillings per head upon such as are not otherwise rated by this act. To be imployed by the Governour of the province of Pennsilvania and territories thereof, for the time being, towards the support of this government.
titleStmt.author: Pennsylvania.
